name: mf-react-rsbuild
description: Rsbuild Module Federation example with Zephyr

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter mf-react-rsbuild-provider run dev & pnpm --filter mf-react-rsbuild-consumer run dev
scripts.preview: pnpm --filter mf-react-rsbuild-provider run preview & pnpm --filter mf-react-rsbuild-consumer run preview
